title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Large vertical rectangle of red satin with an all-around border design of flowers, clouds, and bats embroidered in blue, white, rose, red and gold thread. Wave design on the lower border. Entire center has Chinese characters in black cotton velvet pasted to the satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 19th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-16.
